title: The Woodsy Band Jam
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 63 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 270L
description: Sound the horn! Rosin up the bow! Signs of spring are everywhere, and the animals from the woods are gathering in the meadow for a woodsy band jam! Readers will enjoy reading about the concert while having an opportunity to develop book language using the Out came… repetitive phrase.
meta: came, here, is, my, out, said
banjo, bear, drum, elk, fiddle, fife, fox, horn, jam, owl, rabbit, raccoon, spring, woodchuck
Retell to clarify and understand the text
Reality and Fantasy : Identify reality and fantasy
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /j/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Recognize high-frequency words came, here, is, my, out, and said

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
